title: Nicely 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in the heart of the Cleveland
posting_body: Nicely 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in the heart of the Cleveland .Offering an unexpected abundance of outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large shared patio, and topped with a third-floor wrap-around deck leading to a show-stopper of a roof-top terrace, with built-in planters, an irrigation system, and sweeping views of the Center City skyline and Yuma Landing.
Cats ok Dogs with landlord approval.
You would share the kitchen and family room with the other two tenants.
The house has a small but complete kitchen, a "family room" no tv, an indoor washer/dryer, and 1 parking space per tenant.
It is in a lovely quiet neighborhood.
If you are looking for a comfortable place, with nice and considerate people that you won't see much of, this might be the place you are looking for.
The neighbor has chickens that are rather loud in the morning and can definitely be heard from your room.
Great location and close to FLC, trolley stops and downtown.
Upper-level unit in a small complex with off-street parking.
Rent includes water, sewer, trash and recycling.
Utilities, lawn maintenance and snow removal are responsibility of tenant.
The neighbor has chickens that are rather loud in the morning and can definitely be heard from your room.
